items.sentence: My girlfriend is three years older than I am.
My grandfather usually eats breakfast at six.
My house is about three kilometers from here.
Neither Tom nor Mary was in a talkative mood.
You\'re wanted on the phone, Tom. It\'s Mary.
I can\'t be sure, but I think Tom likes Mary.
I can\'t express myself in English very well.
You won\'t believe what happened to me today.
You\'ll soon be used to living in a big city.
You\'re just going to have to get used to it.
You\'re not going dressed like that, are you?
Tom knew things about Mary that John didn\'t.
I know somebody who speaks French quite well.
I know you were the one who broke the window.
Tom showed me a drawing of Mary that he drew.
His new book is going to come out next month.
How long have you been living on Park Street?
How long have you been using this toothbrush?
Take off your coat and make yourself at home.
When Tom found out the truth, he was furious.
